channel.title: [PI]Can't find words under teleport name. (Ex: Teleport to Varrock)[PI]
channel.description: Well title says it all. When I was coding my teleports, I kinda went through them pretty fast. And I just can't seem to find where I can change this, or make this. Here's a picture of what I mean. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2s10z00.png[/img] How can I change the part in blue that says, "Teleports you to Camelot"? And yes, I did thoroughly look through both my source, and client. Thanks!

item.title: [PI]Can't find words under teleport name. (Ex: Teleport to Varrock)[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Get Blitz:

Try that, if not then ill tell you when I go on my computer

I tried it, got no errors while compiling but it still looked the same. But i’ll wait for you to get to your pc.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Can't find words under teleport name. (Ex: Teleport to Varrock)[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Get Blitz:

Ughh I have this but I can’t acess my computer atm. But just try the next line id like if Pking is 1234 the description 1235 And yes it is in playerassistant

I see. This is my code for the title(it was actually monster teleport not pking lol)
c.getPA().sendFrame126("Monster Teleport", 13037);
And you saying the next one would be like this? c.getPA().sendFrame126(“this is the detail”, 13038);
But would I change the send.Frame?
